text: Your words dropped into my heart like pebbles into a pool,&& Rippling around my breast and leaving it melting cool.
Rippling around my breast and leaving it melting cool.&& Your kisses fell sharp on my flesh like dawn-dews from the limb,
Your kisses fell sharp on my flesh like dawn-dews from the limb,&& Of a fruit-filled lemon tree when the day is young and dim.
Of a fruit-filled lemon tree when the day is young and dim.&& But a silence vasty-deep, oh deeper than all these ties
But a silence vasty-deep, oh deeper than all these ties%% Now, through the menacing miles, brooding between us lies.
Now, through the menacing miles, brooding between us lies.&& And more than the songs I sing, I await your written word,
And more than the songs I sing, I await your written word,&& To stir my fluent blood as never your presence stirred.
